title: The Project for Good Information
description:
A Democratic political strategist is raising $65 million to compete with conservative media. Recode’s Teddy Schleifer explains how the Good Information Project wants to combat right-wing misinformation on the Internet.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Project for Good Information
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: The project is led by Tara McGowan, who’s successfully raised money from Silicon Valley’s biggest political donors for past political startups.
